refund.title: Request refund
refund.subtitle: You can request a refund within the period stipulated by the producer.

dialog.title: Check your email
dialog.description: To confirm this operation, enter the code we sent to your email:

purchase.alert: By requesting a refund, your purchase will be canceled and you will no longer have access to the product.

purchase_detail.title: Request refund
purchase_detail.name: Product name
purchase_detail.more_information: Would you like to provide more information?

reasons.access_issue: I still haven't been able to access the product, but I would like to access it
reasons.need_money: I need the money for other things
reasons.files_not_opening: I received access, but the pages or files do not open
reasons.quality_expectations: The quality of the product did not meet my expectations

refund_dialog.title: Refund requested
refund_dialog.description: Your refund request has been sent successfully. You will receive an email with the status of your request.
